article.title: Simpson Assigned to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics)

tags.tag: Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition

article.text:
Amanda R. Simpson has been appointed to the Senior Executive Service and is assigned as the deputy assistant secretary of defense for operational energy, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.
Â
